definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
Great Firewall of China (system for restricting access to foreign websites)

sentences.chinese: 他們給房頂裝置了防火設備。

sentences.english: The second is to master fire, fire extinguishing basic common sense.
sentences.chinese: 二是掌握防火，滅火基本常識。

sentences.english: Among them, the personal firewall (PFW) software is the best choice for personal users.
sentences.chinese: 其中個人防火牆軟件是個人用戶的最佳選擇。

sentences.english: Inside the firewall, there is no anonymity.
sentences.chinese: 在防火牆內部，沒有匿名機制。

sentences.english: Forever fire resistance is made from aramid materials, with high cost on production.
sentences.chinese: 永久性防火線爲芳綸材料製成，成本較高。

sentences.english: The complexity of a jerry-rigged firewall will undermine its effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 一個偷工減料的防火牆，其複雜性將削弱其效力。

sentences.english: These clouds exist within the company firewall and they are managed by the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 這些雲在公司防火牆之內，由企業管理。

sentences.english: They set fire to Cao's residence and beat up Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 他們還防火焚燒了曹公館並毆打了章宗祥。

sentences.english: Firewalls allow for enforcement of the domain encapsulation.
sentences.chinese: 防火牆允許增強對域的封裝。
上層建築保持防火巡迴檢查。

sentences.english: Clothing which is fire-resistant in air maybe readily ignitable in oxygen-enriched atmospheres.
sentences.chinese: 在空氣中防火的衣服在富氧大氣中可能很容易着火。

sentences.english: Concrete encasement of steel structures used to be a common method of fire protection.
sentences.chinese: 在鋼結構外圍的混凝土常用於防火。

sentences.english: This will be consultative for fireproof design and will be useful for real atrium.
sentences.chinese: 這對實際的中庭防火設計與審覈工作具有參考作用。

sentences.english: A duplicate set of fire control plans should be permanently stored in a prominently marked weathertight enclosure outside the deckhouse .
sentences.chinese: 防火控制圖應永久地儲存在標記顯著的風雨密圍壁內。

sentences.english: Then I saw the fire over my body, especially on my left arm.
sentences.chinese: 然後我看見了我的全身防火，特別是我的左胳膊。

sentences.english: We've not really talked about fire protection.

definition: disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
defense against poison/defense against poison gas/anti-narcotics measures/defense against computer viruses
